title: FinWise Bancorp outlines $50M-$100M credit enhanced balance growth for 2025
excerpt: Discover key insights from FinWise Bancorp's Q1 2025 earnings call: resilience, fintech growth with Bakkt, lower-risk lending focus, and margin challenges.
text: Earnings Call Insights: FinWise Bancorp (FINW) Q1 2025 Management View CEO Kent Landvatter highlighted the resilience of FinWise Bancorp amid macroeconomic challenges, reporting $1.3 billion in loan originations and a tangible book value per common share of $13.42, up from $13.15 in the prior quarter.
